None. Prior to original certification, an FAA representative must perform detailed 
 inspection for workmanship, materials and conformity with the approved technical data, 
 and a check of the flight characteristics.

A plus (+) or minus (-) sign preceding the weight of an item of equipment indicates net weight change when that 
 item is installed. 
 Approval for the installation of all items of equipment listed herein has been obtained by the aircraft manufacturer 
 except those items preceded by an asterisk (*). The asterisk denotes that approval has been obtained by other than 
 the aircraft manufacturer. An item marked with an asterisk may not have been manufactured under a CAA 
 monitored or approved quality control system, and therefore attention should be paid to workmanship and 
 conformity with pertinent data called for in this specification.
